document.full_text: gulf arab states voiced deep concern on sunday over what they called iranian interference in their affairs after iran objected to the despatch of saudi troops to bahrain and a spying row raised tensions.
document.title: gulf arabs states reject iran "interference"
lines_and_colors: gulf arab states voiced deep concern on sunday over what they called iranian interference in their affairs after iran objected to the despatch of saudi troops to bahrain and a spying row raised tensions.
